name: Desert Car Racing: Toto Drift
description:
Here we brought an amazing desert car racing games for kids. Bright, colorful and fascinating game environment provides unlimited fun and pleasure to you. It is an endless game play. Superb 3D graphics are used in Toto drift to give you a live experience. Drift racing in warm weather demands extreme superb drifting skills. But do not worry, in this off the road car racing game provides you an amazing opportunity to learn and enhance your skills. Crazy car racing on desert full of hurdles and ups and downs turn this game into exciting desert car racing for kids. 

Get ready to handle this car racing adventure!! 

DESERT CAR RACING TOTO DRIFT FEATURES
• Survive the harsh desert environment off the road by speeding up your speed 
• Tap on screen to gain more speed
• Fill the fuel by securing as much points as you can
• By reaching on certain score engine, brakes and shocks upgrades will be provided
• Drift racing off the road
• Tilt left to move on left side
• Tilt right to move on right side
• Jump up to and slide down to avoid hurdles
• 4x4 jeep feature will also be provided soon
• Smooth and easy controls
• User friendly
• No internet is required

Game Tips 
• Collect every coin to improve your score
• Collect fuel bottle to refill your car engine 

It is not just a game but a car racing simulator game for kids. Tough yet exciting racing in car gives an immeasurable pleasure. So do not miss this amazing car race game. Do not let Toto miss you…..!! 

Give us your feedback so we can improve our games more…!!
